attributes.comment: Please stop codifying the enforcement of lies from the public to indulge the delusions of people who have dissociated from their sex. Patients have a right to refuse treatment from people of the opposite sex, no matter how they identify. Doctors and others expected to come into close or intimate contact with others have a right to refuse to perform those services for those of the opposite sex. It is honestly exasperating that such a comment even needs to be submitted. Please do your duty to the entirety of the citizenry by recognizing a shared perception of the truth. I promise even those screaming the loudest in protest will ultimately be benefitted by a society that encourages truth telling in health care and all other facets of common life.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
